_meta.purpose: Define preconditions for respawning INTRO_EVT drafting agents

review_gate_status.required: HR_PRE available for new artifact submission
review_gate_status.note: HR_PRE gate can accept new artifact submissions

agent_lifecycle.note: Agent is retired and can be respawned if needed

respawn_decision.reason: All preconditions satisfied. Agent can be respawned to generate or regenerate INTRO_FRAME artifact.
respawn_decision.optional_note: Artifact INTRO_FRAME.json already exists but may need regeneration or review submission

post_respawn_workflow.artifact_submission: Artifact must be submitted to HR_PRE review gate
post_respawn_workflow.approval_required: HR_PRE approval required before phase completion

review_gate_status.required: HR_PRE available for new artifact submission
review_gate_status.note: HR_PRE gate can accept new artifact submissions

agent_lifecycle.note: Agent is retired and can be respawned if needed

respawn_decision.reason: All preconditions satisfied. Agent can be respawned to generate or regenerate INTRO_WHITEPAPER artifact.
respawn_decision.optional_note: Artifact INTRO_WHITEPAPER.json already exists but may need regeneration or review submission

post_respawn_workflow.artifact_submission: Artifact must be submitted to HR_PRE review gate
post_respawn_workflow.approval_required: HR_PRE approval required before phase completion

INTRO_FRAME.note: Artifact exists but has not been submitted for HR_PRE review. Agent respawn may be needed to submit for review or regenerate.

INTRO_WHITEPAPER.note: Artifact exists but has not been submitted for HR_PRE review. Agent respawn may be needed to submit for review or regenerate.

respawn_authorization.note: This artifact defines preconditions only. Actual agent respawn requires explicit human or orchestrator command.

governance_compliance.compliance_note: Agent respawn for artifact generation is allowed in INTRO_EVT phase and does not violate governance rules

summary.respawn_purpose: Generate or regenerate INTRO_EVT artifacts for HR_PRE review submission
summary.note: Respawn is optional but recommended if artifacts need regeneration or review submission

disclaimer: This artifact defines preconditions only. It does not actually respawn agents or modify system state. Actual agent respawn requires explicit authorization.
